message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $100?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $100. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still working within a tight budget. Could we possibly agree on $105 for the product?
